Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to the next occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Declined when followed by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Declined in variants containing repeated reviewer assignment attempts
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between consecutive occurrences of SW-Reviewer Declined in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that eventually reach a decision without further reviewer changes
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time for SW-Reviewer Declined when it directly follows SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Assign a Different Editor in variants where editor reassignment occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Unavailable when both occur in sequence
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the subsequent SW-Reviewer Selection is now due notification
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Declined in complex reviewer assignment loops
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined in a case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Reviewer when reviewer removal is executed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Elapsed time from the first SW-AE Assign Reviewers to the first SW-Reviewer Declined in high-friction review paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases with multiple reminder sequences
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Reviewer Declined measured until the next stable reviewer state (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late in delayed assignment scenarios
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that bypass further reviewer invitations
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
